law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1994; and ch. 224, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1994.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/94). This statute was created by 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 4, and ch. 224, sec. 20, which are substantively identical and have been codified together. In resolving minor variations, Acts ch. 224, the later enactment, has been given precedence.
